snippet.title: 6 Months of Game Development - The Outbound Ghost Devlog
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam➤https://store.steampowered.com/app/1276810/The_Outbound_Ghost/
Twitter ➤ https://twitter.com/OutboundGhost
Discord➤https://discord.gg/UF3hwfk

Music➤https://twitter.com/Kimmsoft_
Character Art➤https://twitter.com/clayzulah

Future Games Show➤https://www.gamesradar.com/the-future-games-show-spring-showcase-returns-this-month/

The Outbound Ghost Future Games Show Announce Trailer➤https://youtu.be/Zm3nbHJ5Czc

Watch the rest of my indie game devlogs➤https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3SUzBUNbS95AaLyW6lD8Pg

Playing The Outbound Ghost On Nintendo Switch➤https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=agq9tARZy1A

Presskit➤https://us3.campaign-archive.com/?u=4325592aabaab10d44092afde&id=ef0cd06dca

Software/Tools Used In General (Not Just This Game):
- Unity
- Photoshop
- Adobe Illustrator
- Adobe Premiere Pro
- Atom
- Visual Studio Code
- Game Maker: Studio 2
- Paper (mario ;) )

#devlog #madewithunity #gamedev #indiegamedev #indiedev #unity3d #girabox #lootboxlyfe #outboundghost #puzzle
